Wisdom: إِنَّ صِلَةَ الْأَرْحَامِ لَمِنْ مُوجِبَاتِ الْإِسْلَامِ وَ إِنَّ اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ أَمَرَ بِإِكْرَامِهَا وَإِنَّهُ تَعَالَى يَصِلُ مَنْ وَصَلَهَا وَيَقْطَعُ مَنْ قَطَعَهَا وَيُكْرِمُ مَنْ أَكْرَمَهَا
enWisdom: Verily keeping ties with near relatives is from the obligatory acts of Islam, and Allah, the Glorified, has commanded that they should be honoured, and He, the Most High, keeps ties with the one who keeps ties with them and cuts off ties with the one who cuts off ties with them and honours the one who honours them

Wisdom: أَوْفَرُ الْبِرِّ صِلَةُ الرَّحِمِ
enWisdom: The greatest righteous act is establishing ties with near relatives

Wisdom: أَفْضَلُ الشِّيَمِ صِلَةُ الْأَرْحَامِ
enWisdom: The best practice is keeping ties with near relatives

Wisdom: ذُو الْكَرَمِ جَمِيلُ الشِّيَمِ مُسْدٍ لِلنِّعَمِ وَصُولٌ لِلرَّحِمِ
enWisdom: The possessor of noble-mindedness has beautiful traits, grants favours [to others] and keeps ties with near relatives

Wisdom: زَكَاةُ الْيَسَارِ بِرُّ الْجِيرَانِ وَصِلَةُ الْأَرْحَامِ
enWisdom: The alms-tax of affluence [and comfort] is being good with neighbours and keeping ties with near relatives

Wisdom: زَيْنُ النِّعَمِ صِلَةُ الرَّحِمِ
enWisdom: The adornment of blessings is keeping ties with [one’s] near relatives

Wisdom: صِلَةُ الرَّحِمِ مِنْ أَحْسَنِ الشِّيَمِ
enWisdom: Keeping ties with near relatives is one of the best practices

Wisdom: صِلَةُ الْأَرْحَامِ مِنْ أَفْضَلِ شِيَمِ الْكِرَامِ
enWisdom: Keeping ties with near relatives is from the best practices of the honourable ones

Wisdom: مِنَ الْكَرَمِ صِلَةُ الرَّحِمِ
enWisdom: Part of honour is keeping ties with near relatives

Wisdom: مِنْ أَفْضَلِ الْمُرُوَّةِ صِلَةُ الرَّحِمِ
enWisdom: Keeping ties with near relatives is from the most excellent magnanimity

Wisdom: لَا يَكُونَنَّ أَخُوكَ عَلَى قَطِيعَتِكَ أَقْوَى مِنْكَ عَلَى صِلَتِهِ
enWisdom: Never let your brother be stronger in severing ties with you than you are in establishing ties with him

Wisdom: إِنَّ الرَّحِمَ إِذَا تَمَاسَّتْ تَعَاطَفَتْ
enWisdom: Indeed when near relatives are in contact, they become kind to each other

Wisdom: بِصِلَةِ الرَّحِمِ تُسْتَدَرُّ النِّعَمُ
enWisdom: By keeping ties with near relatives, blessings flow forth [abundantly]

Wisdom: حِرَاسَةُ النِّعَمِ فِي صِلَةِ الرَّحِمِ
enWisdom: The protection of blessings is in keeping ties with near relatives

Wisdom: زِيَادَةُ الشُّكْرِ وَصِلَةُ الرَّحِمِ تَزِيدَانِ النِّعَمَ وَتَفْسَحَانِ فِي الْأَجَلِ
enWisdom: Increased gratitude and keeping ties with near relative’s increases sustenance and prolongs [one’s] life

Wisdom: صِلَةُ الرَّحِمِ تُدِرُّ النِّعَمَ وَتُدْفِعُ النِّقَمَ
enWisdom: Keeping ties with near relatives makes blessings flow forth and repels calamities

Wisdom: صِلَةُ الرَّحِمِ مَنْمَاةٌ لِلْعَدَدِ مَثْرَاةٌ لِلنِّعَمِ
enWisdom: Keeping ties with near relatives makes the numbers grow and multiplies the blessings

Wisdom: صِلَةُ الرَّحِمِ تَسُوءُ الْعَدُوَّ وَتَقِي مَصَارِعَ السَّوْءِ
enWisdom: Keeping ties with near relatives hurts the enemy and protects one from falling into evil places of destruction

Wisdom: صِلَةُ الْأَرْحَامِ تُثْمِرُ الْأَمْوَالَ وَتُنْسِئُ فِي الْآجَالِ
enWisdom: Keeping ties with near relatives produces wealth and delays death

Wisdom: صِلَةُ الرَّحِمِ تُوجِبُ الْمَحَبَّةَ وَتَكْبِتُ الْعَدُوَّ
enWisdom: Keeping ties with near relatives brings about love and restrains the enemy

Wisdom: صِلَةُ الرَّحِمِ تُوَسِّعُ الْآجَالَ وَتُنْمِي الْأَمْوَالَ
enWisdom: Keeping ties with near relatives increases [one’s] lifespan and makes wealth grow [and multiply]

Wisdom: صِلَةُ الْأَرْحَامِ مَثْرَاةٌ فِي الْأَمْوَالِ مَرْفَعَةٌ [رَافِعَةٌ] لِلْأَعْمَالِ
enWisdom: Keeping ties with near relatives is a means of increasing wealth and a raiser of [good] deeds

Wisdom: صِلَةُ الرَّحِمِ تُنْمِي الْعَدَدَ وَتُوجِبُ السُّودَدَ
enWisdom: Keeping ties with near relatives makes the numbers grow and results in eminence

Wisdom: صِلَةُ الرَّحِمِ عِمَارَةُ النِّعَمِ وَدِفَاعَةُ النِّقَمِ
enWisdom: Keeping ties with near relatives makes blessings flourish and repels [divine] retributions

Wisdom: فِي صِلَةِ الرَّحِمِ حِرَاسَةُ النِّعَمِ
enWisdom: In keeping ties with near relatives there is the safeguarding of blessings
